version_description: - Minor bug fixes
- Design Renewal

- iOS 9 tested.
- Fixed minor bugs.
- Fixed minor bugs.
- Fixed minor bugs.
- Fixed minor bugs.

- Fixed a main list bug
- Fixed a camera player bug
- Fixed minor bugs.

- 10 seconds seeking function with a horizontal gesture.
- Stopped supporting DivX Codec.

- Added a directory to read
- Added push notification
- Fixed a subtitle bug for the videos in folder
- Fixed minor bugs.
- Fixed Minor Bugs.
- Fixed Minor Bugs.

- Fixed crush during playback
- Fixed FTP subtitle

- Dolby codecs are supported on some devices iOS 9.3 or later
- Fixed an issue when playing video app exit

Main screen renovation
Added TVBOX for more contents from PandoraTV
added more Sorting options
Fixed minor bugs

Automatic recognition of additional subtitle encoding.
Media scan progress Displays.
Other bug fixes.

- Improved media data loading speed.
- Add list, album selection menu.
- Fixed interstitial call rate (once a day).
- Added screen lock function.
- Fixed to play from the desired part by touching the player playback bar.
- Fixed other bugs.

- Added gesture brightness function
- Gesture added 1 second moving function
- Add media (video) speed recording function
- Other bug fixes

- Added subtitle selection function
- Added video mirror mode function
- Other performance improvements and bug fixes

1. Remove Full banner
2. Stop supporting some codecs (AC3, E-AC3, MLP)
1. Stop supporting some codecs (DD+, TrueHD)
1. Bug fixes
bugfix
Bug fixed.

Remove top TV box
Remove Connect button
Minor bug fixes.

Remove top TV box
Remove Connect button
Bug fixed.

Below are the new features in KMPlayer.
1. MyList: Create and play your own playlist.
2. Quick Button: Using Quick Button, you can use various functions easily.
3. Subtitle Setting: Set the subtitle size, color and position.
4. Timer: Use the timer to end the video when you want.
5. Equalizer: Enjoy rich audio with equalizer.
6. Search: Search videos and music what you want.
7. New Network Play : Network functions such as SMB, FTP, and UPNP have been enhanced.
8. New Cloud Play: Cloud function has been enhanced.
9. Zoom & Move: Enjoy the video zoom and pan function.

Let's enjoy more powerful playback, more newly features and many improvement functions.

- Improved performance
- bug fix

- Added option to apply audio delay value to entire video
- Change the Media Speed Control UI within the Player
- Add the ability to move to that time by pressing time's text in AB Repeat Control within the Player.
 Other performance enhancements

- Fixed brightness adjustment
- Right to Left UI Improvements
- Fixes the wrong translation in some languages
 Other performance enhancements

- subtitle(right to light UI) improvement
 Other performance enhancements

* Special thanks to the users who feedback.
*** iTunes library media play is supported. ***

* Fixes 
   - Fixed an issue where the gesture option in the music player did not work
   - Fixed the problem that the order of the playback queue is restored to the original.  
* Additions 
   - Sharing option has been added to video and music.
   - Add video extension m4r support

 Other bug fixes and improved reliability

* Additions 
  - iTunes Media's Like and Mylist features has been added.
  - When opening url, the resume function has been added.
  - All has been added to My-> Like tab.
